item.description: Our favorite trivia at Perro Salado is temporarily cancelled....so its time to try somewhere new! Join us Tuesday night at O'Briens pub in Newport for trivia. None of us have been to this one, so we don't know what to expect...except that the more people that show the better chance we have. Everyone can contribute something, so come on out. Trivia starts at 9:30 but we'll meet at 8:30 to get ourselves warmed up with a cocktail or two. Prizes are awarded for the top 3 teams! See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the bar or call my cell: 509 414 8544
item.name: Trivia at O'Briens
